schema.name: Banana Blossom Fresh Spring Rolls

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the chicken thigh, carrots, yellow bell pepper, red bell pepper, garlic, and white onion.
Shred the banana blossom and prepare lettuce leaves.
Bring a pot of water to a boil, add the chicken thigh slices, and cook for about 10 minutes or until fully cooked. Remove and set aside to cool.
In a pan over medium heat, sauté the garlic and onion for about 5 minutes or until fragrant and translucent.
Add the sliced carrots, yellow bell pepper, and red bell pepper to the pan and sauté for another 5 minutes.
Combine the chicken, sautéed vegetables, and shredded banana blossom in a mixing bowl.
Soak a spring roll wrapper in warm water for a few seconds until pliable.
Place a lettuce leaf on the softened wrapper, then add a portion of the chicken and vegetable mixture. Roll tightly, tucking in the edges as you go.
Repeat with the remaining wrappers and filling.

schema.description: Dive into the world of healthy eating with our Banana Blossom Fresh Spring Rolls. This delightful recipe is perfect for those following a low-carb, low-sodium, low-sugar diet. Made with chicken thigh, a variety of fresh vegetables, and the unique ingredient, banana blossom, each bite offers a burst of freshness. Perfect for health-conscious individuals looking for delicious, healthified recipes.
